review: Prescribed Enbrel after 6 months of Methotrexate & Prednisone. My WBC and inflammation was elevated prior to Enbrel. After only 2 weeks, my WBC has returned to normal range. Inflammation has been reduced. Gradually tapering Prednisone after successful Enbrel results. Once a week Sure Click injection is harmless. Don’t freak at YouTube videos that make it seem dreadful. It’s very simple to use. Remove from refrigerator 20-30 minutes before use.
Enbrel (etanercept):Enbrel seems to work for Still's disease. I'm also on 15mg of prednisone daily.
